## Description
Demotivational maker but in Python 3. This one supports multilining.

## Requirements
- <code>Python >= 3.5</code>
- <code>Pillow</code>
- <code>requests >= 2.12.5</code>

## Usage
1. Modify the parameters in the <code>Config.json</code>:
  - <code>Image</code> : 
    - <code>URL</code> : <b>Direct</b> Image URL. <b style="color:red">Cannot be in animated format like <code>GIF</code> / <code>APNG</code></b>.
  - <code>Content</code>
    - <code>Title</code> : Title of the demotivational.
    - <code>Text</code> : Content of the demotivational.
  - <code>Title_Size</code> : <code>Title</code> font size in pixels. <b>Default is <code>50</code></b>.
  - <code>Max_Width</code> : Maximum image width, height is calculated automatically. <b>Default is <code>1400</code></b>.
  - <code>Quality</code> : JPEG Quality factor. <b>Default is <code>75</code></b>.
2. Open <code>Run.sh</code>
3. Share Your image from <code>Images</code> directory.
